Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
CAN: Draw a basic healthy plant with water and light depicted, but with limited detail or accuracy.
Show a plant without water, possibly with wilting leaves, but may not clearly represent the wilting effect.
Attempt to show a plant without light by placing it in a shaded area or shading it slightly, but not very clearly.
CANNOT: Consistently differentiate between all healthy and unhealthy plant states due to lack of water or light (images may look similar or lack clear distinction).
Explain clearly through their drawings that plants need both water and light to live and grow *(student may not connect both factors or focus on only one factor)*.
Accurately represent the difference in size or color between healthy and unhealthy plants *(student may use same colors and sizes for all plants)*.
